channel.title: Seo on Vanilla Forums Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Seo on Vanilla Forums Documentation

item.title: SEO
item.description: Search Engine Optimizations Vanilla subscribes to common sense, vetted principles for improving the findability of your site and its content. We employ no “tricks” because we believe they ultimately hurt your traffic and reputation. Curation Having a team dedicated to the curation of your forum is critical to its success. Concisely edited discussion titles, clearly-expressed first posts, and moving discussions to their most-appropriate category are highly effective search engine optimization techniques.
